comment.text: This key displays the price per backup, formatted with the currency symbol and enclosed in parentheses. It appears within a backup service dialog to show the cost structure to the user. Translators should ensure the currency symbol is handled correctly within the translated string.

usage.context: {t("Common:Backup")} {" "} {t("Payments:PerBackupWithBracket", { currency: formatWalletCurrency!(backupServicePrice!, 2), })}
